State Service (Restructuring) Order (No. 3) 2014

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under section 11 of the State Service Act 2000 .

18 June 2014

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

WILLIAM E. F. HODGMAN

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the State Service (Restructuring) Order (No. 3) 2014 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2014.

3. Establishment of State authority
    Tourism Tasmania is established as a State authority.

4. Amalgamation of Government departments, &c.
        (1) The part of the Department of State Growth known as Sport and Recreation Tasmania is amalgamated with the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
        (2) The part of the Department of State Growth known as Tourism Tasmania is amalgamated with the State authority established as Tourism Tasmania.
        (3) The part of the Department of Education known as Skills Tasmania is amalgamated with the Department of State Growth.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 June 2014

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
